glsa.title: GIMP: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: GIMP is prone to a buffer overflow which may lead to the execution of arbitrary code when loading specially crafted XCF files.

background.p: GIMP is the GNU Image Manipulation Program. XCF is the native image file format used by GIMP.

description.p: Henning Makholm discovered that the "xcf_load_vector()" function is vulnerable to a buffer overflow when loading a XCF file with a large "num_axes" value.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code by enticing a user to open a specially crafted XCF file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
